name: Wonder Guard
short-desc: Protects against damaging moves that are not super effective.
long-desc: This Pokemon is immune to damaging moves that are not super effective against it.  Moves that inflict fixed damage, such as  or , are considered super effective if their types are.  Damage not directly dealt by moves, such as damage from weather, a status ailment, or , is not prevented.  This ability cannot be copied with  or traded away with , but it can be copied with , disabled with , or changed with .  This Pokemon can still use Role Play itself to lose this ability, but not Skill Swap.  If this Pokemon has a , this ability will block moves as usual and any moves not blocked will react to the Substitute as usual.
